name: Joong-Ho Won
content: Joong-Ho (Johann) Won Joong-Ho Won proudly crunching numbers. Follow Seoul, Korea Email GitHub Linkedin I teach computing at the Department of Statistics, Seoul National University. NeurIPS 2025 September 19, 2025 Paper with Ph.D. student Dongwon Kim and group alum Sungdong Lee, “Partial Correlation Network Estimation by Semismooth Newton Methods” is accepted to the 20... HP-ACCORD September 4, 2025 Paper with former Ph.D. student Sungdong Lee, “Learning Massive-scale Partial Correlation Networks in Clinical Multi-omics Studies with HP-ACCORD” is accepte... Teachings this semester September 1, 2025 M1399.000200 Advanced Statistical Computing 326.212 Statistical Computing and Labs Sabbatical Leave September 1, 2024 I am taking a sabbatical leave for one year. I will be visiting the UCLA Biostatistics Department.
